alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 8:27PM EST until January 16 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, changing to sleet and freezing rain overnight. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Delaware, Kent and Inland Sussex. In Maryland, Queen Annes, Talbot and Caroline. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wintry mix changes to rain Tuesday morning before tapering off in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
